TimeseriesId.description: The unique identifier for a timeseries

StartTimestampUTC.description: Start time for the given value. Should be like 2020-03-21T13:00:00.000Z

EndTimestampUTC.description: Start time for the given value. Should be like 2020-03-21T13:00:00.000Z

Period.description: Period in JODA expression like eg 15M

PeriodInHours.description: Period expressed in fraction of hours eg 15M period is 0.25

value.description: The value of the timeseries bucket
